text: James Welch (March 17, 1938 in Anson, Texas — October 25, 2017 Southlake, Texas) was a professional American football player who played nine seasons in the NFL. Jim was posthumously diagnosed with Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy or CTE. title: Jim Welch
